DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is to compare, in a randomised, controlled and prospective fashion, initiation of intrauterine contraception (IUC) at about immediate (0 to 3 days) versus 2 to 4 weeks post medical abortion with regard to expulsions and use of contraception one year after abortion.
DOC.brief_title: Immediate Versus Later Insertion of IUD After Medical Termination of Pregnancy
